comment: The first supplement to the law of quadratic reciprocity. Negative one is a square mod an odd prime ` P ` iff ` P == 1 ` (mod ` 4 ` ). See first case of theorem 9.4 in [ApostolNT] p. 181. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2015.)
